categories: Category:Star Wars: Build Your Own R2-D2

nodes.text: Star Wars: Build Your Own R2-D2 12

Star Wars: Build Your Own R2-D2 12 is the twelfth issue of the Star Wars: Build Your Own R2-D2 published by De Agostini. It contained instructions for constructing the internall chassis and right leg of the buildable R2-D2.
